author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Gulf Air Honors Top Pakistan Travel AgentsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Gulf Air Honors Top Pakistan Travel Agents
Gulf Air, the national carrier of the Kingdom of Bahrain, has honored the airline’s most productive travel agents in Pakistan for 2014 in recent award ceremonies that saw key trade partners, who exceeded their sales targets during the year, recognized and thanked for their loyalty and continued support of Gulf Air across the airline’s 5 serviced destinations: Islamabad, Karachi, Lahore, Peshawar and Sialkot.
Attended by the airline’s top performing agents and representatives of Travel Agents Association of Pakistan (TAAP) the awards ceremonies provided an opportunity for Gulf Air to thank the travel trade for its tremendous support as well to brief them about Gulf Air’s outlook in Pakistan and across the airline’s network.
Gulf Air’s Pakistan Country Manager, Mr. Saleem Motiwala along with the airline’s other sales managers across Pakistan thanked the travel agents for their longstanding support of Gulf Air business while sharing information on the airline’s newest Falcon Gold premium class cabin and discussing potential opportunities for further expansion within Pakistan: “Travel agents are integral to the growth of our airline, and we are taking this opportunity to thank these key agencies across the country for promoting the Gulf Air experience to a wider audience and giving more travelers the chance to experience our unique and distinctive travel offering.”
